@usedefault
{{html:
<a class="btn btn-info btn-large btnfull" > Add SSH key</a>

<h3>Create SSH Key</h3>
<input type="text" data-bind="value: newSSHKey().name">
<br>
<textarea name="" id="" cols="30" rows="10" data-bind="value: newSSHKey().key, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'"></textarea>
<br>
<input type="submit" value="Create" data-bind="click: addSSHKey, enable: !!(newSSHKey().name() && newSSHKey().key())" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">
<br>
<hr>
<!-- ko if: sshKeys().length > 0 -->
<h3>SSH keys</h3>
<table id="sshList" class="table table-striped table-bordered">
<thead>
<tr><th>Name</th><th>Key</th><th>Controls</th></tr>
</thead>
    <tbody data-bind="foreach: sshKeys">
        <tr data-bind="visible: editing() == false">
            <td data-bind="text: name"></td>
            <td data-bind="text: key"></td>
            <td>
                <input type="submit" value="Destroy" data-bind="click: destroy" class="btn btn-danger "> 
                <input type="submit" value="Edit" class="btn btn-info " data-bind="click: startEditing">
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr data-bind="visible: editing() == true">
            <td>
                <input type="text" data-bind="value: name.buffer, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'">
            </td>
            <td>
                <input type="text" data-bind="value: key.buffer, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'">
            </td>
            <td>
                <input type="submit" value="Save" class="btn btn-info " data-bind="click: save"> 
                <input type="submit" value="Cancel" class="btn btn-info " data-bind="click: stopEditing">
            </td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

<!-- /ko -->

}}
